at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication.Connection

  • class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a TCP/IP connection, which exchanges Strings containing JSON objects.

      • getSocket

        java.net.Socket getSocket()
        Reads the underlying socket. This may be null, if the connection is in the disconnected state.
        Returns:
        the underlying socket

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns the connection state.
        Returns:
        true, if there is a TCP/IP connection established

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Closes the connection. Is the connection is not established, any call to this method is ignored.

      • receive

                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Receiving a message from the corresponding peer. This method may block the current thread, if there is no message available.
        Returns:
        the message received
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the message cannot be received
